name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JobMate - Job Application Tracker & Internship Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your job applications with the best job search tracker in 2024. 

With Jobmate you can track all the job and internship…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your job applications with the best job search tracker in 2024. 

With Jobmate you can track all the job and internship applications with a single click. You don't need Excelsheet or notion to manually track all job applications.

Jobmate is your assistant to simplify your job search journey. 

Save your time from the tedious job search process and take it to the next level with Jobmate. 

With this extension, you can:
- Access to the latest internship openings from the best startups and companies
- Organize all of the job applications
- Visualize your job search journey
- Update your job application status
- Save the job and internship on any website and career page on the web
- Access your job application history anytime and anywhere
- Get updates on new job openings for internships and entry level jobs
- Work with all the major job sites including LinkedIn, Glassdoor, Indeed, Wellfound and others


Jobmate powers you to save and track job applications on the internet. No more manual tracking in Excel and spreadsheets. **Make your job search 10x faster with the Jobmate.**

Find, Track, and Secure Your Dream Job Today! Beginning your job hunt with the Jobmate.

Do you want to share your feedback? Connect with us at hey @ entryleveljobs .me

FAQ:
❓ How is this different from the Job tracking spreadsheet?
You have to manually enter all the job and company details in the spreadsheet. Jobmate automates this process. You can access all the applications anytime from any device.

❓ How is this better than Job Tracker Notion?
Jobmate provides single click job tracking solution on all the major job portals so it saves your time manually entering all the application information into Notion every time.


❓ How is this different from Huntr Job Tracker?
Huntr only allows you to track limited jobs on a free plan whereas the Jobmate Chrome extension allows you to track up to 500+ job applications. Jobmate monitors new job openings and internships across various job portals and provides the latest opening
